subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dallas’s top five goal-scorers have yet to beat Vancouver goalie Roberto Luongo, a big reason the Stars are trailing 2-1, going into Game 4 of their first-round series.
snippet: Dallas’s top five goal-scorers have yet to beat Vancouver goalie Roberto Luongo, a big reason the Stars are trailing 2-1, going into Game 4 of their first-round series.
